description:
This is part 3 of 4 from the October live show.

Beretta is bombarded with many sensations, bringing her to an overload of her mind and body. Her nipples and clit are suctioned. The 7 wheeled neuro wheel rolls across her tight flesh as she feels every prick on every inch of her sensitive skin. Her nerves are spiked enough for the hot wax drips to send her over the edge.

Her mind and body is wrecked, just in time to be machine fucked, sending her deeper into sub space.
title: Bound by metal, covered in wax, fucked by machine
